H0.text: Earth has a moon is the major reason Earth has seasons.

H1.text: Earth has a tilted axis is the major reason Earth has seasons.

H2.text: Earth has a magnetic field is the major reason Earth has seasons.

H3.text: Earth has an elliptical orbit is the major reason Earth has seasons.

A4.text: This is the cause of Earth's seasons.

A5.text: The Moon has a stabilizing effect on Earth's obliquity.

A6.text: Variations in Earth's axial tilt can influence the seasons and is likely a factor in longâ€‘term climatic change.

A7.text: Earth's seasons are caused by the tilt of its axis, not by the Moon.
